message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $100. It's a rare opportunity to get a product worth $300 at a fraction of the value. It's a 75% discount, a deal you won't want to pass up.
I'm not going to fall for the hype. I'll pass on this one.

That's a $200 value, absolutely free. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't regret it.
